headline20: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 9 airports right now.
management45: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 9 airports right now. Across base airports: 1 critical, 21 high, 16 medium, 1 normal. Base airports needing attention include London Luton (LTN/EGGW), Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR), Chişinău (RMO/LUKK), Iaşi (IAS/LRIA) and Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT) and 17 others. Other base airports are mostly medium severity and should be monitored (16 flagged). At base airports, the main issues are snow and runway contamination risk at Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD), Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR), Chişinău (RMO/LUKK) and Modlin (WMI/EPMO) and 1 others, low cloud base at Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD), Iaşi (IAS/LRIA), Suceava Stefan cel Mare (SCV/LRSV) and Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) and 16 others, and mist at Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD), Iaşi (IAS/LRIA), Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) and Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT) and 14 others. Across the network, the worst‑affected airports include Copenhagen Kastrup (CPH/EKCH), Malmö Sturup (MMX/ESMS), Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB), Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH), Lennart Meri Tallinn (TLL/EETN), Turku (TKU/EFTU) and 3 others. Primary drivers are cold‑temperature performance penalties, snow / blowing snow and low cloud base. Expected impact: reduced runway capacity and higher delay/diversion risk at the worst‑affected airports, especially where visibility/RVR and cloud base are very low. Since the last update, 12 airports changed status, led by Copenhagen Kastrup (CPH/EKCH), Malmö Sturup (MMX/ESMS), Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB), Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH), Lennart Meri Tallinn (TLL/EETN), Turku (TKU/EFTU) and 6 others.
detail90: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 9 airports right now. Base airports (focus): London Luton (LTN/EGGW) — HIGH: cloud base around 400 ft | Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) — HIGH: fog; runway contamination risk; cold-temperature performance penalties | Chişinău (RMO/LUKK) — HIGH: mist; runway contamination risk; cold-temperature performance penalties | Iaşi (IAS/LRIA) — HIGH: mist; cloud base around 200 ft; below alternate minima (current METAR) | Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT) — HIGH: freezing fog; visibility down to 500 m, cloud base around 100 ft; forecast below approach minima at times | Bucharest Henri Coandă (OTP/LROP) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 600 m, cloud base around 100 ft and 16 others. Worst affected now: Copenhagen Kastrup (CPH/EKCH) — CRIT: snow; cold-temperature performance penalties; strong gusts risk (drivers: cold-temperature performance penalties, snow/blowing snow) | Malmö Sturup (MMX/ESMS) — CRIT: snow; cold-temperature performance penalties; strong gusts risk (drivers: cold-temperature performance penalties, snow/blowing snow) | Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB) — CRIT: freezing fog; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: runway contamination / reduced braking, cold-temperature performance penalties, very low visibility) | Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH) — CRIT: mist; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: runway contamination / reduced braking, cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings) | Lennart Meri Tallinn (TLL/EETN) — CRIT: snow; cold-temperature performance penalties; cloud base around 400 ft (drivers: cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings, snow/blowing snow) | Turku (TKU/EFTU) — CRIT: mist; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings, mist) and 3 others. Changed since last run: Copenhagen Kastrup (CPH/EKCH), Malmö Sturup (MMX/ESMS), Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB), Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH), Lennart Meri Tallinn (TLL/EETN), Turku (TKU/EFTU), Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD), Solidarity Szczecin–Goleniów (SZZ/EPSC), Milan Bergamo Airport / Antonio Locatelli Air Base (BGY/LIME), Frankfurt-Hahn (HHN/EDFH) and 2 others.
